body:
Mojang has done an excellent job stalling their Modding API, especially when Jeb himself said that he had "high hopes" that it will be done in 2014, and what is it now? They've been induced into an exclusive interview, where they discuss when and why their modding API hasn't been so successful as of its current state.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z2We5sLDVrw
